channel.title: CVE Feed for Michael Uno (miunosoft) -- Auto Amazon Links – Amazon Associates Affiliate Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Michael Uno (miunosoft) -- Auto Amazon Links – Amazon Associates Affiliate Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-52175|2024-07-23T17:23:30.304Z -- michael%20uno%20%28miunosoft%29 -- auto%20amazon%20links%20%E2%80%93%20amazon%20associates%20affiliate%20plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Michael Uno (miunosoft) Auto Amazon Links – Amazon Associates Affiliate Plugin allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Auto Amazon Links – Amazon Associates Affiliate Plugin: from n/a through 5.1.1.
